revised_title: Investigations on the Proper Current of Frogs and Warm-blooded Animals
tldr: The author conducted experiments on frogs and warm-blooded animals to study the proper current, which is the electrical current generated by muscle contractions. They discovered that the proper current flows from the tendon to the muscle within the muscle fibers. This research helped to explain the similarities and differences between the proper current and the muscular current in various animals.
